    Me Class

    Extends User
    Defined in: src/index.js:645

    Represents the client connection as a User. Has the ability to update it's state on the network. An instance of Me is returned by the OCF.connect() method.

    Constructor

    Me

    (
    • uuid
    )

    Defined in src/index.js:645

    Parameters:

    • uuid String

      The uuid of this user

    onAny

    (
    • callback
    )

    Inherited from RootEmitter: src/index.js:62

    Listen for any event on this object and fire a callback when it's emitted

    Parameters:

    • callback Function

      The function to run when any event is emitted. First parameter is the event name and second is the payload.

    update

    (
    • state
    • chat
    )

    Inherited from User but overwritten in src/index.js:673

    Update this user state over the network

    Parameters:

    • state Object

      The new state for Me

    • chat Chat

      An instance of the Chat where state will be updated. Defaults to OCF.globalChat.

    Properties

    chats

    Object

    Inherited from User: src/index.js:555

    keep a list of chatrooms this user is in

    direct

    Chat

    Inherited from User: src/index.js:574

    direct is a private channel that anybody can publish to but only the user can subscribe to this permission based system is not implemented yet

    feed

    Chat

    Inherited from User: src/index.js:563

    every user has a couple personal rooms we can connect to feed is a list of things a specific user does that many people can subscribe to

    states

    Object

    Inherited from User: src/index.js:547

    keeps account of user state in each channel

    uuid

    String

    Inherited from User: src/index.js:539

    the User's uuid. This is public id exposed to the network.
